text: Balclutha may refer to: * Balclutha (1886), a sailing ship built in 1886 and now preserved in San Francisco, California * Balclutha (leafhopper), a leafhoppers genus in the tribe Macrostelini * Balclutha, New Zealand, a town in the Otago region of New Zealand * Sir Charles Cameron, 1st Baronet (1841–1924), Scottish doctor, newspaper editor and politician * a small short- lived settlement that occupied some of the same area as Louisa, Kentucky
title: Balclutha
